DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multi-dose , single-arm , Phase 1 , dose-escalation study XmAb5574 . The study conduct identify maximum tolerate dose ( MTD ) and/or recommend dose ( ) ( RD ) study , characterize safety tolerability , characterize PK , PD immunogenicity , evaluate preliminary antitumor activity XmAb5574 patient relapse refractory CLL/SLL .
